did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Approximately 5,000 comic books published between 1984 and 2004.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Approximately 5,000 comic books published between 1984 and 2004.

descgrp.head: INFORMATION FOR USERS

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Comic book collection, #8033. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

descgrp.p: See ComicBookDB.com for more specifics about comic book issues.
